inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of HGPIN or ASAP in a minimum of 1 of 8 cores from a biopsy
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Prostate biopsy with a minimum of 8 cores performed within 6 months of study entry
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: 30-80 years of age at the time of registration
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status 0-2
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Normal organ and marrow function as demonstrated by the following parameters being within normal institutional limits: complete blood count (CBC); liver function tests (LFTs); albumin, total and direct bilirubin, alkaline phosphatase, aspartic transaminase (AST), alanine transaminase (ALT), and total protein
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Serum creatinine <1.5 mg/dl or measured creatinine clearance 60 cc/min
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Evidence of acute prostatitis or urinary tract infection at the time of PSA measurement
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Current or prior history of prostate cancer or other malignancies
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of renal or hepatic disease, including history of hepatitis B, C or delta
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Participation in any other investigational study or use of any other investigational agents within 30 days of study entry
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 55 year old man visiting his primary care physician for lower urinary tract symptoms. He has normal organ and marrow function as demonstrated by the following parameters being within normal institutional limits: complete blood count (CBC); liver function tests (LFTs); albumin, total and direct bilirubin, alkaline phosphatase, aspartic transaminase (AST), alanine transaminase (ALT), and total protein.
